title.rendered: Fees for Emirates ID, Visit Visa and Residence Visa Set to Increase in UAE

content.rendered: The UAE visa fee has remained steady for a long time now. As part of a string of changes to the visa and residency system implemented recently, the Federal Authority for Identity and Citizenship, ICA e-channel fees are speculated to increase by AED 100 for Emirates ID, visit, and residency visas. The overstaying fee will also be standardized to AED 50 per day for those overstaying on visit visas and residency visas.

excerpt.rendered: Good news for entrepreneurs in UAE – Attractive free zone offers to launch your business UAE free zones are …
